summary: Completed testing of Level Display fix and Favorite Clubs features. Core UI functionality working correctly, backend has session authentication issues for favorites.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 401 Unauthorized even with valid session cookies after authentication
flaky_endpoints.impact: Heart icon toggle functionality may not work properly

data_issues.issue: No match data available due to missing API key (403 response)
data_issues.impact: Cannot test heart icons on actual match cards

integration_issues.issue: Cannot fully test heart icon toggle due to backend session auth issue

passed_tests: No 'Favorite' tab visible when not authenticated
User registration flow complete with nickname setup
Level badge shows 'Level 0' correctly in header
Level badge dropdown opens with Trophy icon, Level 0, and 0 pts
Level badge responsive on desktop viewport
Favorite tab appears only after authentication
Favorite tab shows correct empty state message
Backend auth endpoints working (register, login, logout)
Backend health and basic endpoints working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session authentication issue for favorites endpoints - /api/favorites/clubs returns 401 even with valid session cookies. Consider checking session cookie name (session_token vs session_id) and cookie settings.
